mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_complete (order_name, order_phone, delivery_type, recipient_name, recipient_phone1, recipient_phone2, postcode, address, deliver_memo, total_price, total_count, user_seq, address_detail) VALUES (#{orderPersonName}, #{orderedPhone}, #{deliveryType}, #{recipientName}, #{recipientPhone1}, #{recipientPhone2}, #{postcode}, #{address}, #{deliveredMemo}, #{totalPrice}, #{totalCount}, #{userSeq}, #{detailAddress} );
